fe.text: I help designers, small agencies and businesses bring their ideas to life. I turn business requirements into scalable, clean and efficient software - on time and on budget.

be.text: Although I am focused on front-end development, I wouldn't mind getting my hands on backend development

learner.text: I like to keep my self updated on the latest trends and technology.

aboutPage.info2: I am a frontend developer by profession and an Indian
aboutPage.info4: I have over 4 years of experience building awesome frontends.
aboutPage.info5: I love developing awesome software, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser. I 've a keen eye for detail and really good at teamwork.
aboutPage.info6: Enjoy your time here and have  nice day

resumePage.desc1: Developed multiple Frontend projects for various clients. The prototypes were built mostly using technologies like ReactJs, Angular, GraphQl, Node(express), Webpack etc.
resumePage.company2: d group GmbH(now part of Accenture)
resumePage.desc2: Worked with agile teams, transformed complex concepts into simple, elegant services and products. Developed and maintained critical components of e-commerce websites
